website_summaries.verdict: As hitting machines go, this is a toy. It is fun, but effectiveness is an issue. Other offerings are better.
pros: Stable pedestal allows for hitting and fielding practice
cons: Feels cheap and is made with a lot of plastic

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Super versatile product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been THE BEST GIFT for my 12 year old. He loves baseball and will spend at least an hour playing with this in the backyard. I love that it's more than a pitching machine so he can practice fielding and catching the ball. This is the best gift and I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: sherry d johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This actually shoots much further than I expected. My son is 12 and he enjoys it. We bought extra balls so he can practice without having to reload as frequently. It does not always shoot in the same spot even though it hasn't been moved but overall great for a beginner!
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my grandsons Christmas gift. When I opened the box to check the battery size (as there is absolutely no information or pictures on the box and this box was inside an Amazon box) this is what I saw. Dusty, scratched and looks previously used. I will never order from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: This is a cool idea but even with positioning it correctly the balls ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool idea but even with positioning it correctly the balls come out and never go the direction they are supposed too. They fall short or go too far. Makes it frustrating for the kids trying to practice batting or catch.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our grandson & it works great. He is 8 & loves it!! It's great for him because he just started playing baseball and this not only pitches, but will also do pop ups and grounders for him to practice. Great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without original packaging or instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for a birthday present. It arrived the day of the party and it wasn’t even in the product’s actual box. The pieces were thrown into a simple brown box without instructions on how to assemble it. Not what I was expecting since one of the photos shows the pitching machine in the appropriate box. Cannot give as a present.
customer_reviews.author: James Leone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this for our grandson's birthday and he is really into baseball. The machine works as designed and we practiced till the batteries went dead. Reloaded the batteries and started again. Pros: the batteries will last a long time even with constant use. Varied pitch/fly balls. Definitely a great training aid. Cons: it only runs on batteries. It's only used as a training aid, hard plastic, light balls.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pert

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Meh.... not so impressed. I was pretty excited about this because I am a single mom who can’t pitch. Well, it’s not that great. I should just learn to pitch.
customer_reviews.author: C.F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor accuracy. Balls are light
customer_reviews.text: Accuracy is totally off. My 5 year old and all of us get frustrated. However for the price it isn't bad. It's kind of fast for my 5 year old who is a very good player so we put it very far away so it gets to his level but it's only there 30 percent of the time. Kind of weird
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Batting Buddy
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy. It has taken our kid from the video games and helped him gain confidence in his skills. Even his father was also practicing his batting skills.
customer_reviews.author: Migdalia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Received non-functional unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but unable to evaluate other aspects of the product as it didn’t work once assembled. Also missing a part (extender tube) and re-taped box leads me believe it was a returned product. My first experience with this problem from Amazon and I’ve purchased over 700 products from Amazon over years.
customer_reviews.author: George G

customer_reviews.title: Okay for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Unpredictable but fun for beginners . I am not happy that the packaging was damaged. I purposely did not buy the amazon wearhouse deal because i wanted a new one. I'm sure there is better out there for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for young beginning ball players
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son (6yrs old) to practice with at home. Everyone enjoys this machine even the adults will join in and play a pop fly catching game with the kids. We've lost one ball of the 6 it came with but they sell a replacement ball set on the Franklin sports website so we're not too worried about it. Wish I had purchased this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This machine seems very cheaply made but it does what you’d expect. This is great for batting practice as well as catching pop flies,etc. I only which you could graduate to real baseballs in the machine instead of the hollow, plastic balls supplied with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time looking
customer_reviews.text: Biggest piece of junk we have ever got from amazon. Don’t waste your time looking. Don’t waste your money hoping. Tossed it in the trades after the second time trying. Inconsistent even indoors. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Guerin

customer_reviews.title: For fun not training
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for a bare bones inexpensive toy to prevent me from throwing to my kid. But I was hoping it would be more accurate than me, and it’s not. The “soft toss” isn’t as advertised (I think). I definitely don’t think it’s good for training, but maybe when the kid gets a little older, he’ll be able to chase the balls and hit them. It does work well for catching ground balls and teaching him to adjust his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: This is absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this piece of literal garbage. It spits out a hittable ball like every 6th time. This thing sucks, whoever made this and thought this junk was sellable or passable as a thing should be drawn and quartered.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: How or where do I buy the balls that come with this machine?
customer_reviews.text: This says clearly on the box that it comes with six balls that fit the machine it came with zero my grandson waited all day for his birthday present and now can’t play with it because it didn’t come with any balls!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Balmer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: The only con I have is the accuracy of ball location. It changes with each pitch. Otherwise definitely worth the money and kept little ones busy on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, balls go every which way with zero consistency.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great purschase
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old nephew loved this for his birthday! Great purschase and got a ton of use out of it. My 4 year old nephew also enjoyed playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: not as accurate as hoped
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent pitching machine for the $, but it doesn't seem to deliver the plastic balls to the same area consistently. It also lacks a pause feature.
customer_reviews.author: Rpilar

customer_reviews.title: Very inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 yr old, he was so excited. Unfortunately, this machine lived up to so many other reviews and didn't pitch with any consistency. Pitch variation would be okay, but this wasn't pitch variation, it was a poor product. One pitch would bounce 3 ft away and another would about take his head off. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 8yr old to practice in backyard. Works way better than expected. Pitches farther than expected. He had so much fun with it Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Friend

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my nephew. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber201

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality had to return did not work properly
customer_reviews.author: Loran R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: The balls would occasionally get stuck if track. If I slightly jostled the unit it would get the ball back on track to be fed through. Kids love this!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 6 year old son! Love it! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shannadowa

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: My parents bought this for my 5-year-old son who LOVES playing baseball. I was really impressed by how awesome it is! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Riley

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: perfect for kids that are pass the tball stage but not quite ready for the balls to be thrown at super high speeds to them. I only hate that it does not hold more balls. it is a pain to have to keep stopping to reload. balls fly out at a pretty good pace
customer_reviews.author: Steelers4Life

customer_reviews.title: Not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: This thrower is not consistent at all. Some balls are in the zone but most are to wide or to far on the inside. Not good for teaching a young player. And it drains batteries very quickly. We’ll probably just use it to work in catching.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. My 12 and 5 yr old are enjoying!
customer_reviews.author: 2 and counting

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece to practice in the back yard. Make sure you have the right bat for this, plastic or a lighter material will work best. Its mainly to work on timing and confidence in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Our kids love baseball. It pitches and does pop ups. It is very entertaining for kids of all different levels with tball and baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: but pretty cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This was neat, but pretty cheaply made. My 5 boys destroyed it after playing with it twice. Disclaimer is they are extremely hard on toys!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit!
customer_reviews.text: As described. My 8 year old grandson loves it. His hitting and catching has improved greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: This product has amazing power. It adjusts a ton of ways which ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has amazing power. It adjusts a ton of ways which is good for ground balls, pop ups and different pitching styles. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old son to play with in the back yard. This is not a product for little league playing on a ball field but perfect for practicing in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: twinmom42

customer_reviews.title: received used item
customer_reviews.text: i just received this and it looks like its been used, scratches on it the box was beat up. was hoping to use for easter gift but i dont even know if it will work??! if i was getting a used one i wouldn't of paid this price!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my son can practice hitting and catching. It’s ok for the price you pay. Hard to get the ball to go straight most of the time when hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Only works with the type of wiffle balls they give you and just about nothing else. Balls don't go far but it's good for little kids
customer_reviews.author: Brayden M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 6 year old nephew. He loves playing baseball so he needed something for extra practice. It took some practice getting use to the speed of the pitch, he's use to a much slower speed, but other than that it's great! It's definitely saving the adults from having to constantly chase the balls and throw them for him.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Gray

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This machine is ok to start out hitting on but it isn't fast enough to advance in hitting skills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably better for a small
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 10 y/o daughter so she could practice for softball. Very surprised by how small it was. Returned this item. Probably better for a small child
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't pitch straight
customer_reviews.text: The thing just doesn't work. The balls go all over the place and not the least bit accurate. I can see ground balls and fly balls working but not pitching.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Not very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Batteries die fast. Only got about 30 minutes before they started to run down. Wish there was a power cord option instead. Also broke a stake the first time we tried to set it up. Very cheap plastic stakes. The motor runs constantly and take a little while to get to to speed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money on a better quality unit
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. :( Our boy was SO excited to get this but it never worked properly. Spend your money on a better quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Owens

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, good for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in age group it lists. More for toddlers and tee-ball starting to learn the essentials. I got this because my son is in coach pitch and I can't hardly throw it in the strike zone. Thought this would help with watching the ball The balls are so light, you can't use if there's a breeze. The pitch is inconsistent
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: One happy family
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to set up and the children loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon G.

customer_reviews.title: Average for pitching great for pop flys
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it, but nothing special. Balls don't always go wear aimed so probably need to make sure it's being used on level ground. Has worked pretty well with fly balls though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old could not hit a ball so I tried it also. Very inconstant pitching. 1 would hit you and the next would be outside your reach. There was maybe 5mph wind but there usuall is by me. Gonna have to return it. Gave it 2 stars because it seems to be made well and the ground steaks work well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bartik

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas present! cant wait for the weather to warm up to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cogswell

customer_reviews.title: Really good for hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old grandson loves it. The ball flight is different every time, high, low, left or right. Really good for hand eye coordination. I would not consider this toy a serious pitching machine as only about 1 in 5 pitches are in the strike zone.
customer_reviews.author: P. Geisler

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's not perfectly accurate every time but for my 4 year old nephew, it's PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan S

customer_reviews.title: Void it all cost
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product takes multiple D cell batteries I'm shoots the ball about 3 feet
customer_reviews.author: Gators2060

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are misleading. Can't use real youth baseballs with them. Only works with plastic balls :(

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work out of the box. Won't feed balls corectly

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. Gave it a shot, but you get what you pay for. The accuracy is extremely poor and varies greatly with each ball.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my 6 year old! Made the perfect gift and spring activity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old son and he loves this! It is a great starter set. It pitches the ball, does grounders and pop ups. Comes with stakes and my son can operate it on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Kids Pitching Machine
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible!! Box was damaged, pitching machine was used, missing baseballs, and get this, does not come with batteries but batteries were in it and they were dead.
customer_reviews.author: Pascual Banuelos Sr.

customer_reviews.title: It really is a fielding machine
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the kid for Christmas. It works ok for feilding, but forget it for pitching. Each pitch is wayyyyyyy off from the last. Most of the hit the batter. The real deal killer is the 15 minute life you get from the 4 required c batteries. Replaced with another slightly more expensive brand that had a plug in adapter. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is for plastic balls so a little inconsistent for bating practice but works great for catching fly balls
customer_reviews.text: can't beat it for the price. It is for plastic balls so a little inconsistent for bating practice but works great for catching fly balls. my kid are kind of young so when they get hit it doesn't hurt much
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product comes in parts in a brown cardboard box. Not in the box pictured. Very disappointed. Was going to give as gift but not anymore.

customer_reviews.title: The machine is typical Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: Balls get stuck. They don’t shoot out right. The machine is not worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Nice start for someone just starting
customer_reviews.text: I like the machine for my son and he's having a ball. Make sure you have enough batteries if you are going to be outside for a while. I ended up getting rechargeable batteries for this machine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy to put together and take apart for storage kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Blake Walton

customer_reviews.title: It's fine for working on short fly balls
customer_reviews.text: This unit is designed for the younger player. It's fine for working on short fly balls. The ball is spinning in reverse for grounders, so the ball comes out fast and slows down quickly. For hitting, the light ball comes out too fast so the inexperienced hitter does not have time to swing. The ball is way too fast for soft-toss.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: cheap balls!
customer_reviews.text: the balls are really cheap, they broke the first time my grandchildren used it, ages 3 and 7.

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy / Plastic Ball
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. Very flimsy. Doesn't use real balls or tballs. It uses cheap plastic balls that come with it. I would not recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! My son is 9 and loves it. Wish it held more balls but other than that no complaints. May want to get rechargeable batteries.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for 6 yr old grandson. It works as discribed. We love the ability to increase baseball skills beyond Tee Ball.Allows multiple players to join in.

customer_reviews.text: For the price it's hard to complain. But it sure does throw some wiley pitches. My 9 year old would prefer something that is more consistent for batting. So he just uses it for catching.

customer_reviews.title: but good luck hitting a strike zone
customer_reviews.text: Exciting present for under the Christmas tree, it does throw balls, but good luck hitting a strike zone. Pitches can be over 6 feet apart. Probably collect dust till I scavenge the motor for something else. But this is what I expected for the price.

customer_reviews.title: but it works good. It was my first pitching machine to buy
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't quite what I expected, but it works good. It was my first pitching machine to buy.

customer_reviews.title: this was ordered to give as a gift
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately all the pieces came in a cardboard shipping box and not in original manufacturer packaging. Not very appealing to give as a gift.

customer_reviews.title: Baseball learning tool
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 7 year old to practice with his batting. We have been very pleased. It has held up very well and most importantly given our son the confidence he needed to hit during his baseball games. An extra bonus is that he was able to practice grounders and fly balls with it too. I would highly recommend this pitching machine for those just learning or those with the ability but not consistently hitting. It makes a huge difference. The only downfall was when he started hitting the home runs from the machine pitches, there was a lot more running for me to chase the balls down. I won't complain about that, though.
customer_reviews.author: BAMom

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t pitch consistent pitches. Don’t dare try it on a windy day.

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Baseball Pitching Machine - Adjustable Baseball Hitting & Fielding Practice Machine For Kids - with 6 Baseballs - Great For Practice,Blue
product_meta.description:
The Franklin Sports Super Star batter pitching and fielding machine is the ultimate baseball training aid for any young slugger. Practice hitting or fielding all at once by adjusting the launch angle to work on the desired skill. Practice hitting soft toss or quick pitch by adjusting the height to your liking. Or you can practice fielding skills by setting the launch angle to practice pop flies or ground balls. This machine is perfect for helping kids practice all the baseball fundamentals. Just load the ball feeder with our compatible plastic baseballs and get ready to play. Learning the game has never been easier.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Perfect for building confidence and skills in young players. The MLB® Super Star Batter & Fielder easily adjusts for practice hitting or fielding. It has a tri-pod style base and ground stakes for added stability. The telescopic ball feeder expands to hold 9 balls. Included is 6 Aero-Strike® plastic baseballs. Requires 4 "C" size alkaline batteries-NOT included.
feature_bullets: Perfect baseball toy: This is the perfect toy for any young Baseball fan. Just load the balls and get ready for the pitch. Nothing else needed but a bat or glove and room to play for hours and hours of Baseball fun!

Adjustable angles: adjust the launch angle to practice hitting soft toss or fast pitch. Or work on fielding by adjusting the angle to practice ground balls or pop flies. With the Super Star batter you can practice all your skills at once!
Great for young players: this pitching machine is perfect for teaching young players how to hit and field!
Balls included: This pitching machine comes with 6 compatible plastic baseballs to put in the ball feeder which can hold up to 9 balls at once! Balls pitch every 7 seconds!
Battery operated: Requires 4 "C" Batteries that are not included with the set

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars393 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
